title: Cheonggyecheon Stream Restoration
description: 35% reduction in pollution, 50% increase in property value.

title: Paris, Vélib' Bike Share Program
description: 100,000 daily rides. 32,330 tons of CO2 emissions saved annually.

title: London Pocket Parks Program (Green Spaces)
description: 100 pocket parks created. Increased local property values by up to 8%.

title: Barcelona Superblocks Initiative
description: 20% reduction in NO2 levels within superblocks. Increased public space per resident from 1.85 m to 6.65 m. 5-10 decibel decrease in noise pollution. 30% increase interaction among residents.

title: Medellín's Green Corridors
description: Temperature drops of up to 2°C in some areas. Airborne particulate matter (PM10) levels have decreased by around 7%. Social, economic, and cultural impacts observed.
